description:
At the law firm of Perantinides & Nolan in Akron, Ohio, we focus our efforts on helping innocent accident victims and their families secure their rightful compensation and benefits following an injury or loss caused by another party's negligence or wrongdoing. Serving clients throughout Ohio and parts of Western Pennsylvania, the attorneys at our law firm provide personalized assistance and dependable representation to those who have medical malpractice or personal injury claims resulting from any of the following:

  • Anesthesia errors
  • Birth injuries
  • Brain injuries
  • Hospital negligence
  • Late or missed diagnoses
  • Medication errors
  • Nursing home neglect and abuse
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Defective products
  • Dangerous property conditions
  • Intentional torts
  • Other related claims of negligence

For more than 45 years, our attorneys have advocated on behalf of those in need throughout our community. We work hard to obtain the maximum amount possible for our clients' pain and suffering, and we have secured substantial settlements and awards for victims of personal injury and medical malpractice. As evidence of our success, our law firm is widely regarded as one of the top personal injury practices in the region, and our attorneys have earned memberships in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum. 

At Perantinides & Nolan, we have on our staff a team of highly rated and board-certified attorneys who are ready to help you obtain the justice you deserve. To discuss your case in more detail, you can contact our law firm to schedule a free initial consultation.
